00027 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoSubNode.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFFloat.h>
00029 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFColor.h>
00030 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFVec3f.h>
00031 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFEnum.h>
00032 #include <Inventor/elements/SoEnvironmentElement.h>
00033 
00034 class COIN_DLL_API SoEnvironment : public SoNode {
00035   typedef SoNode inherited;
00036 
00037   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoEnvironment);
00038 
00039 public:
00040   static void initClass(void);
00041   SoEnvironment(void);
00042 
00043   enum FogType {
00044     NONE = SoEnvironmentElement::NONE,
00045     HAZE = SoEnvironmentElement::HAZE,
00046     FOG = SoEnvironmentElement::FOG,
00047     SMOKE = SoEnvironmentElement::SMOKE
00048   };
00049 
00050   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00051   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00052 
00053   SoSFFloat ambientIntensity;
00054   SoSFColor ambientColor;
00055   SoSFVec3f attenuation;
00056   SoSFEnum fogType;
00057   SoSFColor fogColor;
00058   SoSFFloat fogVisibility;
00059 
00060 protected:
00061   virtual ~SoEnvironment();
00062 };
